GK21brkas_pu:8: meant as a working input for myself at first, though I am willing

GK21brkas_pu:11: text: Cases of printing mistakes in the edition were silently
GK21brkas_pu:12: corrected. In a few cases I also adopted a different reading, when
GK21brkas_pu:13: it seemed to make more sense. It is also an uncorrected version.

GK21brkas_pu:8965: kṣaṇaṃ ca tatra viśrāntāṃ |tām āliṅgam asau ca mām |
GK21brkas_pu:8972: uktvā ruṣṭaiva tāṃ dṛṣṭvā |sācaṣṭa sma kathām imām ||28.48|
GK21brkas_pu:8974: na ca tatra mayā dṛṣṭā |mārgayantyā nṛpātmajā ||28.49|
GK21brkas_pu:8989: mama tv āsīd aho śaktir |dohadasya varīyasī |
GK21brkas_pu:8997: atha tasyā- mayā gatvā |samīpaṃ vandanā kṛtā |
GK21brkas_pu:9003: sukhāsīnāṃ ca mām āha |bhartā te sukhabhāgini |
GK21brkas_pu:9005: punar āha sa te bhartā |chāttratvād durjanaḥ kila |
GK21brkas_pu:9006: āhārādyair durārādhas |tvayā tad iti me matiḥ ||28.65|
GK21brkas_pu:9009: punar uktaṃ tayā smitvā |nedaṃ saṃbhāvyate tayoḥ |
GK21brkas_pu:9013: mayoktaṃ sarvam asty etat |kiṃ tu tau divyacakṣuṣau |
GK21brkas_pu:9014: yad evādiśataḥ kiṃcit |tat tathaiva hi sidhyati ||28.69|
GK21brkas_pu:9015: jyeṣṭhasya ca guṇā- jyeṣṭhās |tābhyāṃ kasyeti mānuṣāḥ |
GK21brkas_pu:9019: evaṃ ca kṣaṇam āsīnām |āha māṃ rājadārikā |
GK21brkas_pu:9021: āstām āstām iti mayā |anicchantyā yāvad ucyate |
GK21brkas_pu:9029: atha vā tvaṃ parādhīnā |bhartaiva tava nirdayaḥ |
GK21brkas_pu:9033: matsaṃdeśaṃ ca vācyo 'sau |kim asthāne kṛtam tvayā |
GK21brkas_pu:9049: tayā yad guru saṃdiṣṭam |upalabdhaṃ ca yat tayā |
GK21brkas_pu:9052: satsv apy anyeṣu sūtreṣu |tatredaṃ cintitaṃ tayā ||28.88|
GK21brkas_pu:9056: anayā [Missing text] prītim |ādhāsyaty api kām iti ||28.90|
GK21brkas_pu:9065: kiṃ ca nānyā tataḥ kācid |darśanīyatamā yataḥ |
GK21brkas_pu:9071: mama tv a-sīd iyaṃ cintā |kiṃ mamopāyacintayā |
GK21brkas_pu:9074: yathā tāḥ prāptavān asmi |tathā rājasutām iti ||28.99|
GK21brkas_pu:9082: prātar eva prāyātāsmi |tad eṣā mucyatām iti ||28.103|
GK21brkas_pu:9083: atha tasyai pratijñāya |gacchatv evaṃ bhavatv iti |
GK21brkas_pu:9089: āstāṃ ca mama tāṃ dṛṣṭvā |kṣaṇaṃ mānasacakṣuṣī |
GK21brkas_pu:9096: mayi dṛṣṭam adāt tasyāṃ |gāḍha [Missing text] ṭhagrahārhaṇām ||28.110|
GK21brkas_pu:9099: ahaṃ tu tad dinaṃ nītvā |kṛcchrān mandiraniṣkuṭe |
GK21brkas_pu:9103: sā ca māṃ tatra paśyantī |saṃtataṃ priyadarśanām |
GK21brkas_pu:9107: ārādhayāmi nṛpasūnukṛte nu gaurīṃ |kiṃ khānayāmi caturais tvaritaṃ suruṅgām |
